doc.field: Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored. Website was rescoped to attempt to capture the Vimeo videos embedded in the website.

https://soundcloud.com/fortnightjournal/ and https://vimeo.com/fortnightjournal/ were added to the collection to capture embedded video and audio files. Embedded Soundcloud audio and Youtube and Vimeo video files on the site were captured, but do not render in the archived copy. Future changes to the Wayback Machine may allow the files to be played.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
